website_summaries.verdict: Everything a single guinea pig needs in an affordable package.
pros: Lots of room for one guinea pig
Owners like the covered area, and praise how easy the cage is to set up
cons: Full width opening makes it difficult to keep pet inside while feeding
If you want a second guinea pig you'll need a second cage

customer_reviews.title: Good cage for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. I have two guinea pigs our third one passed away so the other two are super clingy to each other. I had a two story trixie cage but now due to us moving to a smaller place I needed a little smaller cage. They love this cage and on the outside I put a fence so they get plenty of floor time. Piggies are happy usually they only sleep in there as they are running around outside their cage 90 percent of the day. I didn't use the plastic water bottle because I have a glass one for them.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great Guinea Pig inclosure!
customer_reviews.text: We recently got 2 Guinea Pigs and this inclosure suits them perfectly. It has the straw trough, water bottle area, cave and stairs leading up to their food dish. I wouldn't put anymore than 2 guinea pigs in this inclosure in my opinion. Easy to take apart and clean. Great product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Weber

customer_reviews.title: decent larger cage for two caveys
customer_reviews.text: I had my two adult male guinea pigs in a small cage. They did well in it, but needed more space. This is a pretty good value. Easy assembly, several useful features including the front door is the entire side of the wire enclusure. The water bottle is good and a good size but the holder doesn't stay. I went back to two pieces of wire for the bottle and it works well. I didn't use the upper level/hideout because the boys stayed there all the time. They haven't managed to upset the food dish, but it does tend to migrate around the bottom of the cage. Overall, a good solution for two caveys!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great cage bad water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great cage! A lot of people would say how small it is and how your supposed to make your own huge cage but some people just can’t set up a five foot cage on the floor of their houses. So this was big enough for my guinea pig to live and run around in and then I let him out to play. Loved all the features! Water bottle leaks horribly though.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a small for a guinea pig this is good to have if you need to transport them but this is not good for long-term
customer_reviews.author: AZGuy86

customer_reviews.title: Good starter habitat.
customer_reviews.text: Giving this four stars because parts to the water bottle were missing and the directions were pictures only and a little confusing. But it's a good size for my 9 week old Holland Lop and will be fine as his starter habitat until his fancy bunny condo ships next month. I didn't use the feeder since I bought a separate one and the missing water bottle parts didn't matter much because I had one. I use the included dish for his morning pellets. Romeo loves the little loft and cozy cave. He's a happy bunny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cage but be careful of escape!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cage SM! I moved my gerbils from a small one into this; first off its WAY BIGGER then expected which is awesome! Second my gerbils love it! So much room, the only down side is the bars are a little far spaced apart so they can get out but I sealed it with screeningso be careful when buying but overall it’s an absolutely amazing cage :) they are very happy
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Arrived a day late which is fine considering I don't get my guinea pig till Monday ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day late which is fine considering I don't get my guinea pig till Monday but I'm very pleased with this cage. Very roomy, easily set up, and it comes with a bowl and water bottle for your pet
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Maddock

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this for the Guinea pigs my mom's Guinea pig will be having. But, I got curious about it and put her piggies in it, and they love it! Was worried bout the steps, but they can use them. They also LOVE the hidey hole.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: My Piggy's place
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a nice habitat. Assembly easy. Fairly sturdy, and nice design. Read reviews about the water bottle leaking badly. I feel can be explained from it being rather thin material. I haven't had it leak more than a drop or two all week. And the Guinea Pig has taken to it quickly. He likes the hiding place. His food and hay at the top. And can get to his water easier. Overall I would give it an 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: David L Dabbs

customer_reviews.title: It is a great little starter cage for rats or any other
customer_reviews.text: My pet rat loves this cage! He loves to hide out under the platform. It is a great little starter cage for rats or any other exotic
customer_reviews.author: Bradford

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice cage
customer_reviews.text: I used this cage for my rats, which was a mistake, because they easily maneuvered their way through the bars. Ended up chicken wiring the cage. It was much bigger than I expected which is good because now my rats have a lot of space. All the pieces were there and no defects. I think if you actually had a guinea pig, it would be really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Tan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps messes contained!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cage. I run a daycare, so keeping the area AROUND the cage is make or break as far as hygiene regulations go. This cage has a DEEP bottom which contains all the mess, shavings, food ect. The hideout let's the Guinea have a place to escape if kiddos bother him too much, the water bottle fits perfect and clips in easy. Easy to clean as well. These were the biggest factors for me and what made this cage different and the best I have seen so far. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Seth Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Great cage. Really recommend! 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage! & So does my piggy (Nilla) 😍 I didn't have a cage for her for a few days because I had just adopted her and I was in desperate need for a cage for her. My bf and I got on Amazon and looked for one & This was the cage that caught both of our eyes. She loves the hiding spot more then anything haha! I think that if you're a new piggy owner as well, this would definitely be the ideal cage. Thank you ! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Large for giant hamsters
customer_reviews.text: My hamsters are two years old and, since they are elder hamsters, they tend to move less. This cage is good for them to enjoy their elder life. The only problem is that the gap is a little bit large and they can escape from the cage. But, since I live alone the room is tiny I am okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: wzj2023237

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price, easy to clean. The door is flimsy and my kids broke it already so it’s holding up by some attachments. If you don’t have small children it’s probably great. The 2 Netherlands dwarves we have like it and we will keep it for traveling but are upgrading to a bigger cage.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of the local pet store!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice cage and houses two guinea pigs who seem to love it. Great price, which was half of our local "big box" pet store for an almost identical item. Easy to assemble. Works great. The water bottle is a little on the cheap side and tends to drip if you mess with it and usually drips a drop or two after the critters take a drink but not really a major issue at all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt @ LookIntoHawaiiDotCom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cage! Bad extras!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got my Guinea Pig she adjusted well into it. My problem is that the water bottle leaks constantly and made the begging grossly moist, so I had to replace it with a non-drip bottle. Also the hay holder wasn’t working out well so I had to replace that too. The cage itself is awesome but I hate that I had to replace the needed extras with better versions
customer_reviews.author: matt michitsch

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for 1 Piggie
customer_reviews.text: Since my piggies were fostered separately, they fight to the point of drawing blood if commingled in 1 enclosure. These cages provide enough space for toys, 1 piggie, and food/water. Having the hide built in is a nice touch, and really makes this a nice value for the cost versus getting an empty design with an igloo. Took about 10 minutes to assemble 2 cages, and they are sturdy and escape proof (for my piggies). Overall very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce The Goose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cage for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: We just got it today. I love the ease of unpacking, setting it up, the flat roof, large front door, and the color! The only issue I had was the water bottle. No matter how full, it wouldn't stop dripping, so I had to run out and buy another one. Out of all the cages we've had over the years, this by far is the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how easy this was to set up . I unexpectedly became the owner of a guinea pig and had nothing but a box so this was like a palace to the piggy . He went straight into the hidey hole and made himself at home . The raised sides keeps the poop and hay in so it helps with keeping things cleaner . The only issue I have is that the water bottle is too skinny for the holder , can’t use it . Great price , nice product for a guinea pig
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth smith

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a great home for a Guinea pig or two
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it, though I wasn't impressed with the water bottle setup. It's designed well, but the plastic clamp doesn't hold the bottle to the cage when its filled with water. It simply slips down through the clamp. Other than that, I'm very happy with the quality of the materials and the way the space is organized, complete with the ramp and under shelf hideaway.
customer_reviews.author: Y.Lefrak

customer_reviews.title: Everything included, easy to assemble,  perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cage! We bought two to separate Guinea pigs that were starting to fight when they were sharing a large cage. These are easy to assemble and a perfect size for 1. I was concerned about the water bottles because they look very cheap... but so far no problems. The only thing I have found is that our larger piggie will knock off his water bottle if it isn't in just right. We haven't had that issue with the other one. I would buy again without question!
customer_reviews.author: H. Nail

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wow I’m so amazed! This was under $60 and it brought: a water bottle, bowl and container (not sure if that’s the right word)for his food! All for my guniea pig! I bought a cage for him last year that was over $100 and it brought nothing! This is perfect. I wasn’t expecting anything but the cage to be quit honest. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey Avila

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is 1000 times better than our original guinea pig cage! It is easy to assemble, has a built-in house with the platform on top for food dish (included), hay feeder which can be moved around. The cage portion attaches & detaches easily for cleaning. My 11-year-old is able to manage this cage by himself!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great place for your cavies to live, just have somewhere bigger to exercise them
customer_reviews.text: Our cavies love their cage. I do recommend a playpen to excessive them in daily so they have room to play. The hay bin is a great addition, but make sure it’s empty before taking top off to clean. Also wish the plastic wiped clean, we have some serious staining going on under the litter.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great cage but hay feeder needs to be fixed
customer_reviews.text: We love this cage! We have a Netherland Dwarf bunny. He has plenty of room and seems very happy in the cage so far. My only complaint is that the hay feeder doesn’t fit properly but we fixed it by ordering small zip ties and securing it better and now it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered on time but the last two rows ...
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time but the last two rows of wire along the bottom were so bent I had to use pliers to straighten them out so it would align with the bottom. Had I not needed that day I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Death trap
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this cage to anyone that loves their pet. My daycare's guinea pig was found on a Monday morning with her head stuck under the plastic "house". She was deceased. My daycare kids were devastated. Without the plastic home it is a good cage, but I would never use it with that piece again.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Heidelberger

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged
customer_reviews.text: The package I received was completely smashed and I had to heat it in order to bend the plastic. Water bottle was crushed and even the wire was bent. Otherwise, it looks like a good cage and I love the hideout it comes with. I think it needs to be in better packaging so it doesn’t happen to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Swearengin1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cage for a crazy climbing hedgehog like mine!! Very big and roomy! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Best deal ever!! If need will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing large cage! My rabbit loves the little hideaway, uses the stairs and has plenty of room for play even with his corner litter box addition. Love that the entire front side of the cage opens completely. Also, locks very very securely into place when shut.
customer_reviews.author: Manda Chronowski

customer_reviews.title: Great product! But not big enough for more than one small animal.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great, durable cage. Great price and the right size for one guinea pig. However, if you have more than one piggy this cage simply isn’t big enough for two, and certainly not big enough for a rabbit. I am very pleased with the quality given the low price. Definitely better than the store products. This product rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Morris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it & so does Chandler. It was easy to put together & it’s the perfect size for him. The only thing I’d have to get used to is opening the cage from the front when I was used to opening it from the top with his old cage but I will adjust to it
customer_reviews.author: JuJu

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: It's huge! Pictures don't do this justice. This cage is twice the size of anything we looked at in the pet store! Would be perfect for a bunny or multiple animals! Our guinea pig has plenty of room!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Cheap plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Am I the only one person Who’s bottle keeps dropping water? And the black corner stripes doesn’t work at all. So hard to assemble it! Every time I clean my cuties bedding, I was struggling with the black stripes. Couldn’t return because I don’t have the package.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: It has a flimsy bottom cleaning is not to bad as long as you have a kitty litter scooper to scoop the soiled bedding out with you have to lift the side of the cage up to take your animal out it's just an okay cage
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: This is just a carry cage!
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent as a carry cage but not even close to being big enough for long term housing for a Guinea Pig. It would be abusive to keep an adult pig in a cage this small.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Stover

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for guinea pigs.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter's little guinea pig loves her new home. Love how it opens completely in the front. Makes it less stressful on Mocha when taking her out. Only issue is the water bottle leaks no matter what we do.
customer_reviews.author: Xanetea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage and so does my guinea pigs. Made well and easy to clean and open. Not a big fan of the water bottle but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Hannahkitty

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is huge. I wasn't expecting it to be as big as it is haha. I got it for my two sister rats, because a couple days ago they chewed two holes through their old cage. It was delivered a day early and just in time! They really needed an upgrade. They love the little cave too
customer_reviews.author: Dbaker_

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: This cage is still working out for us. Our guinea pigs cannot climb the latter but we put the food down below. We also do not use the hay tray on the side because our cats take it out if we do. Our two guinea pigs love the cage and have more than enough room.
customer_reviews.author: clfoxmsw

customer_reviews.title: I knew the dimensions and thought it was a great size for a guinea pig
customer_reviews.text: I knew the dimensions and thought it was a great size for a guinea pig, but once my daughter adopted Katy, we realized it was way too small, the poor guinea pig could only turn around in circles and eat, not suitable. After about a week we decided to buy another cage for her and after she moved she was way more active. The only reason I gave it two stars was because the bowl, water bottle and hay rack were great. please consider what I am saying before buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for inactive or older pet.
customer_reviews.text: This cage is too small for an active bunny or guinea pig. But ours is older and he doesn't run around much. So he loves this. Easy to clean, looks great in our family room and he loves being in the middle of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Better than picture...
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than the picture. Very spacious. Our guniea pig was so excited to get a new cage. It's also easy to assemble. I love it so far. Just got it 2day
customer_reviews.author: Yandasmom

customer_reviews.title: Great! Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: A simple cage for our guinea pig. It works and was easy to put together. I appreciate the water bottle and bowl that was included. My little furry pet is snuggled in and happy!
customer_reviews.author: LovetoRead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Guinea Pig
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my guinea pig, Pumbaa. She needed something better than the one she came with (she was re-homed to me). She loves the little house. I already had a hay feeder and water bottle so I didn’t use the ones it came with. I couldn’t be happier and neither could she.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Hudson

customer_reviews.title: The bar spacing is definitely too wide for Syrian hamsters ...
customer_reviews.text: The bar spacing is definitely too wide for Syrian hamsters, and ours is on the large size. Had to modify mine with hardware cloth. Otherwise, the cage is very roomy with lots of space for Fluffy to play.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: A major safety concern.
customer_reviews.text: The cage certainly looks cool, but buyer beware. The plastic hut doesn't sit flush against the cage wall, leaving gaps where the guinea pig's feet and legs could get trapped. Also, the water bottle leaks, as mentioned in other user feedback comments.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Our Piggies love it and so so we!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is exactly what I was looking for when I wanted a bigger cage for our piggies! It fits perfectly on top of our ferret cage and they have plenty of room to hop around. I think they even liked it because they both started squealing and hopping around when we put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lewis

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: very easy to assemble. Great size. Great deal with all the accessories. All you need to buy is the shavings,food and the pet! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Coto

customer_reviews.title: So-so material quality
customer_reviews.text: The plastic could have been a little thicker and the wire cage could have been thicker gauge material. The metal cage bent very easily. It did come with decent accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for such a big cage. Our little furry friend loves it! It’s nice that the whole side swings open of access to inside the cage. Very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine was in need of a cage, her children talked her into a guinea pig. We searched high and low at all the local stores and they were so expensive! This one is perfect! The price was right and it came with more than just the simple cage. The section where the guinea pig can "hide" or as the kids call it, it's home is a nice addition. Great cage, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Henderson

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: we love it, our guinea pig loves it she is giving birth soon and is big enough for her and babies ❤
customer_reviews.author: Ana M

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, love the way the cage opens, very wide and once the door is closed it stays closed even if not locked. Easy to lock, 2 quick pushes locks the door tightly. The cage is easy to clean, nice wide open. Perfect for small pets!
customer_reviews.author: Maryjane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage!!
customer_reviews.text: Great cage!! For many months, I looked for a cage that was cheap, yet durable and I never found one. This cage though, is exactly what I was looking for. It functions great as a hedgehog cage, and I'm sure for many other animals. This built-in cover is perfect, and saves you from having to buy a "home" for your pet separately. The built-in bowl is a little hard to clean, but some scrubbing gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Great for my classroom guinea Pig!
customer_reviews.author: whit

customer_reviews.title: Grat cage and size!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is much larger than the picture reflects. Its plenty big for our guy Earl. Lots of space for roaming around, eating and a nice cave area for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: TJD

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage, great design but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice cage for guinea pigs. I love the design. Unfortunately it arrived damaged (probably because it was poorly packed) and has continued to break at the damaged edges. I couldn’t return it because I had to use it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my guinea pig. There's plenty of room to play with. It's great that it came with several accessories. Cleaning is easy, especially if the top is removed.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Florencia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great, easy to clean home for out two young guinea pigs. They love running up and down the ramp, especially in the evenings. Great price for an all inclusive first home.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rosenbalm

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Cage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage because I needed a smaller cage for my daughter's guinea pig. We originally adopted two guinea pigs, and bought the extra large cage so they would have enough room to run around. Sadly, one guinea pig passed away, so now when we go away for the weekend, we can transport her in her "travel" cage, and it still allows her enough room to run around.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 1 guinea pig
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need is included, my gpig loves the place to hide. The ramp is no problem. The hay storage is a mess or it's just my gpig. I have only one gpig and the size of the cage is great. The food bowl is pretty big. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: not worth it..
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright but it’s cheaply made and overpriced. The cage is way too easy to open and the hay rack isn’t at all functional.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a travel cage for my 2 guinea pigs. But this cage is too small to have my guinea pigs inside for a long time, so don’t get it as their main shelter. Other than that, it’s a great cage and comes with everything you would need.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good for one full sized guinea pig, probably not enough room for two though.
customer_reviews.text: Good enough, fairly large but still fits on my dresser. Mine arrived with a few cracks (nothing structural and I needed it immediately so I couldn't return) so I docked a star.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and functional features.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year-old set it up easily. Her little guinea pig loves the safety of the hideout and the ability to hop up on the platform for food. The food bowl sits on a built-in ledge so it stays put and the Timothy Hay holder attachment keeps the hay from mixing in to the bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Brent N.

customer_reviews.title: the water bottle does not stay on the cage very good
customer_reviews.text: The water bottle is not very good but the rest of the cage is awesome my guinea pig loves it
customer_reviews.author: mindy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: The size Is appropriate for a guinea pig and the product was easy to assemble. I would highly recommend this product. Good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: uriel mauricio arana

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect cage. There is plenty of room, and it comes with a hay feeder, food bowl, and water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Annika McGaughy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Its a great size for my daughters skinny pig. Plenty of room for the guinea pig to roam around. Water bottle, pellet dish and hay shoot perfect size. Front side opens up for easy access to the feeding dish and to get the pig out. Going to adding a corner Potty dish which should fit nicely. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Nazarenus II

customer_reviews.title: Space and easy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: My minnie is very excited to move on to her new home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rats love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for two of my male rats. I would think this is too small for a Guinea pig.
customer_reviews.author: M Warren

customer_reviews.title: Pig loves his hidey hole.
customer_reviews.text: I have a mostly blind guinea pig that’s not very active. This is a nice cage for him. Easy to put together and a decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: WATER BOTTLE ACCESSORY IS DANGEROUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cage itself is cheap but functional. If you purchase DO NOT USE THE WATER BOTTLE!!!! The end fell completely off while my baby guinea pigs were using it, and the little metal ball inside came out. If my pigs had swallowed it, they would HAVE CHOKED TO DEATH! Also the entire bottle of water drained into the cage, causing them to go without water and sit in wet bedding until I discovered what had happened!
customer_reviews.author: Kim M

customer_reviews.title: OUR LITTLE PIGGY LOVES NOT FOND OF UPPER LEVEL
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT EASY TO USE NO ISSUES YET OUR LITTLE SCOOTER GUINEA PIG LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Base was cracked/broken on arrival. Will update review rating once I’ve received a response from manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Came with all the little accessories. I use it for my hedgehog and she loves the little hiding spot!
customer_reviews.author: Sharpie9815

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This is great for guinea pigs . My guinea pig can easily eat out of the bowl and go in the hut . Easy to assemble and take down . Not cheaply made either !
customer_reviews.author: David L. Corsette Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Barely stays together.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and the clips barely holding the cage. For this quality if I had known I wouldn't have paid more than 25-30.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nuggie my guinea pig  love  her home ❤️So much❤️
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble , although it’s quite small for my nuggie (guinea pig), over all she loves it, especially her bed , that she has a privacy 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: Antoniette Villafuerte

customer_reviews.title: First pet cage !
customer_reviews.text: It's a great cage ! We got for our daughter first pet we looked for a cage for ever and finally found one it's big and it comes with everything the only problem I have is the water bottle doesn't really work so we had to purchase a new one but besides that the cage is perfect !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Citlalli

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Freaking love this thing. Had many different sizes and kinds of cages for my guinea pig and this by far is my favorite. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: EHyland

customer_reviews.title: great size for this animal.
customer_reviews.text: sent to my granddaughter for her pig and they both really liked this cage.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage!
customer_reviews.text: I have two rabbits, and the other cage I have is smaller compared to this. I like that it's bigger because both of my rabbits can fit together. Easy to assemble. Great price too! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Merylin Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Happy home
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade for our pig Skittles! She loves the little cave, I love the opening on the side. Makes the cage WAY easier to clean, especially with the cage liners.
customer_reviews.author: P Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected!
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot bigger than I expected! Works perfect for my guinea pig! This is a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This animal pen is absolutely perfect. It is super easy to assemble and it is the perfect size for my hedgehog. You cannot beat the price and what you get for the price. I am blown away by the quality of the product and everything that comes with it. My hedgehog is already much happy and more active in his new bachelor pad!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great for First Time Guinea Pig Owners!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for first time guinea pig owners. My piggies really loved the little hiding spot it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this for a small mammal! It is very easily escaped! We put our hedgehog and she was out within a few hours. The walls do not have clasps that attach at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 small babies for a short time
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our guinea pigs. We had to separate the males which we knew we would have too eventually. This cage is enough rm for one guinea pig but, will work for 2 small babies for a short period. Good quality. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: shelia schlueter

customer_reviews.title: Get your own water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Just got the cage set up for my pet rat. Cage itself is alright, but the piece to support the water bottle does not hold it when full. It slips right through. The bottle seems pretty cheap too. Going to have to buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cage for the value. It looks sleek and clean, it’s easy to clean, and the guinea pigs have some space to move around!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Large and spacious
customer_reviews.text: Thjs hiding are moves around too much and falls does. Too good of a hiding place for my pet that he doesnt want to come out
customer_reviews.author: c z

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend in this cage
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage it's easy to clean the guinea pig loves it
customer_reviews.author: Karron Teter

customer_reviews.title: Good product. My hedgehog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hedgehog. The water bottle is useless and keeps falling off the holder. The big bowl isn't helpful either because the hedgehog doesn't like climbing up to get food. But she loves the little covered area.
customer_reviews.author: Janik Perera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Plenty of room for my guinea pig. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: blu3yed.rav3n

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a dwarf rabbit!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need at a affordable price!! Good quality! Just what I was looking for, for my bunny!!
customer_reviews.author: Nae

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: My Guinea pig Nala absolutely loves the hide out. Awesome size loves that the food bowl and water bottle and hey feeder is all included. Nothing was damaged when received. I have had several cages but this is my all time fav. Love the huge door. JUST WOW 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jade

product_meta.title: Cavie Guinea Pig Cage & Rabbit Cage | Pet Cage Includes Free Water Bottle, Hay Feeder, Hide-Out & Food Bowl
product_meta.description: Style:Guinea Pig Cage (30-Inch Long)The Cavie 80 is a great starter cage for guinea pig parents. Each Cavie guinea pig cage includes a food dish, water bottle, plastic hay feeder and a built-in guinea pig hide-away. This guinea pig cage is also ideal for hedgehogs. The deep 6-inch base contains guinea pig litter and other debris and the top front / side portion of the cage fully opens for easy access or cleaning. The Cavie measures 30.3L x 18.5W x 16.5H and the metal mesh on the top portion of the cage is 1W x 10L inches. Each Cavie guinea pig cage comes with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty. If you have any questions regarding this pet cage our customer service would be glad to help you. Customer service can be reached at 1-800-428-8560, available 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM, Monday - Friday.
feature_bullets: Fully Equipped Guinea Pig Cage | Cavie is a great starter guinea pig home & includes a food dish, water bottle, large guinea pig hide-out
Easy Maintenance Guinea Pig Cage | Front & side doors fully open for quick cleaning access and the deep 6-inch base contains litter & other debris inside the guinea pig cage
Great Guinea Pig Starter Cage | Guinea pig cage measures 30.3L x 18.5W x 16.5H inches, deep base measures 30.3L x 18.5W x 6H, wire mesh is 1W x 10L inches
Versatile Pet Cage | Cavie is an ideal choice as a guinea pig cage & a hedgehog cage
Ferplast Quality Guarantee! | Cavie guinea pig cage includes a 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty
